KSLO_RICH_TEXT_T.FORMATTED: The ability to use sensory cues to ...
KSLO_RICH_TEXT_T.PLAIN: The ability to use sensory cues to guide motor activity. This ranges from sensory stimulation, through cue selection, to translation.
